alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:26PM CDT until May 12 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jewell County in north central Kansas... Eastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Webster County in south central Nebraska... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Guide Rock to near Esbon to near Downs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Guide Rock around 435 PM CDT. Burr Oak, Ionia and Bostwick around 440 PM CDT. Mankato around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Nelson, Jewell, Randall, Webber, Lovewell State Park, Montrose, Formoso and Hardy. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
